text: George Ignatius Brizan, CMG, CBE (31 October 1942 â€“ 18 February 2012) was a Grenadian politician who was the Prime Minister of Grenada for four months in 1995. Brizan died at the General Hospital in St. George's, Grenada from problems caused by diabetes on 18 February 2012, aged 69. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Grenada Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:University of the West Indies alumni Category:University of Calgary alumni
